committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to direct the Postmaster General to issue a commemorative stamp honoring the 75th anniversary of United States naval aviation.

summary.text: Directs the Postmaster General to issue a commemorative stamp honoring the 75th anniversary of U.S. naval aviation. Specifies the stamp's denomination and the dates within which it may be issued. Directs that the stamp be sold during a period set by the Postmaster General and bear a design approved by the Secretary of the Navy.

titles.title: A joint resolution to direct the Postmaster General to issue a commemorative stamp honoring the 75th anniversary of United States naval aviation.
